title: It has been at least 6 months since any road construction has occurred on Wrightsville Ave in the Forest Hills area, but the begin and end construction signs remain in front of our homes on Country Club Rd near the Wrightsville Ave intersection.  Have they been forgotten?  Is more construction coming?
text:
This previous post at MyReporter.com contains a phone number for the
local sign office: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7752
